price: O sister of Aaron,[8] your father was not a man of evil, nor was your mother unchaste.”
arabic: يَٰٓأُخۡتَ هَٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمۡرَأَ سَوۡءٖ وَمَا كَانَتۡ أُمُّكِ بَغِيّٗا
footnotes: [8] Aaron was a pious man at the time of Mary, or she was from the descendants of Aaron, Moses’ brother.
